title: Compiling boolector with emscripten
body:
I want to get something like http://jgalenson.github.io/research.js/demos/boolector.js, but the one here is a much older version of boolector (1.5.x) and has some bugs (fails after several queries).

References:

github.com/meteor/minisat-emscripten/blob/master/boolector/build.sh

https://kripken.github.io/emscripten-site/docs/compiling/Building-Projects.html#building-projects

I tried running emconfigure ./configure.sh after downloading boolector 2.4.1 from the main boolector site (not enough reputation to post more than two links), but the subsequent emmake make failed. Calling emmake make after the normal configure (./configure.sh) worked, but the resulting boolector program in bin was not LLVM bitcode.

Can any expert help on this one? Thanks in advance!
